name: Subs omnibar
author: shazbot
label: Subscriptions omnibar
desc: Quickly jump to a magazine by viewing your subs in a floating search panel (type to search). Use the meta key to open/close the omnibar. The meta key will not take effect inside of text fields. If you are logged out, the omnibar shows default magazines (most popular).

fields.label: Mobile device support
fields.checkbox_label: Add tappable element (yellow bar) to screen
